processingCommand.script:
@ECHO OFF
pushd e:\

IF NOT EXIST LongRunningQueriesExist.flg GOTO NotFoundIt
echo "!!!! LongRunningQueriesExist.flg found escalate to support !!!!"

echo Deleting LongRunningQueriesExist.flg
echo ------------------------------
del e:\LongRunningQueriesExist.flg

exit /b 1

:NotFoundIt
echo File LongRunningQueriesExist.flg Not Found

set resexe=0
